page.title: 11HOUSING.
page.content: The majority of the housing in this area is concentrated in squares 1 and 2 and while there is a small amount of owner occupied housing the majority of dwellings are council owned properties. These consist of terraced housing found on either side of the 'main' road going through the area and a second and more recently built crescent of semi-detached houses. Some of the latter have been made into flats, two in each house, for the elderly residents. Some of the older buildings are old weavers cottages and farm houses which have been modernised. These show that the main industries of the area were weaving and farming.
